all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Therefore, be ye strong from henceforth; fear not, for the kingdom is yours.
Doctrine and Covenants 38:15
Quote of the Day
"Our obedience to God’s laws and commandments can open the way for our Savior to provide the understanding and healing He knows we need."
Tracy Y. Browning | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
